title: Wilton Foundry Newsletter: Introducing Diplomat Script
content:
Submitted by [paul d hunt](http://web.archive.org/web/20070806224543/http:/typophile.com/user/7006 "View user profile.") : 23.Mar.2006 2.46pm 

After successfully launching Portfolio, we decided to create a simplified version.  
 [Diplomat](http://web.archive.org/web/20070806224543/http:/mail1.icpbounce.com/icp/relay.php?r=1013299288&msgid=2263287&act=YK5P&c=27410&admin=0&destination=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.fontselect.com%2FMerchant2%2Fmerchant.mvc%3FScreen%3DCTGY%26Category_Code%3Ddiplomat) is pretty simple but the swooping ascenders and descenders creates the illusion of a more complex script.  
Diplomat is useful when clear communication is essential  
Diplomat, in combination with its elegant lowercase, creates a very elegant presentation  
useful for Invitations, Corporate Identities, Brochures, and Headlines.  
Wed like to remind you that if you buy ANY of our fonts  
you will get the next one at 50% off - AND there is NO limit to how many you may buy.  
We still offer secure, direct, online payments using all major credit cards.  
Your font download instructions will automatically and immediately be emailed to you.
author: paul d hunt
